title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally; supports Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and 50+ others with one-line pull/run.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat endpoint in chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (formerly ollama-ui)
summary: Full-featured, open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; dark mode, code highlighting, multi-user, file upload.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with syntax highlighting, chat history, and key bindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental Vim plugin that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-py
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to chat, generate, and embed with local Ollama models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama exposing synchronous, reactive, and Kotlin-coroutine APIs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library that provides an easy C# client for Ollama with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: Pull request adding Ollama backend to GPT4All desktop GUI so users can switch between llama.cpp & Ollama servers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components for pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama model replies into any guild channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-mode to answer questions with local Ollama models; no public internet required.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: r/ollama – Model discussion thread
summary: Active subreddit where users share newly supported models, performance benchmarks, and troubleshooting tips.
